title: It's a Rumic World: 50th Anniversary Weekly★Shonen Sunday
original_name: It's a Rumic World: 50th Anniversary Weekly★Shonen Sunday
sinopse: The characters from Ranma 1/2, Urusei Yatsura, and Inuyasha all gather together in a short crossover to introduce the 50th Anniversary Weekly Shonen Sunday "Rumic World" Museum opening, celebrating Rumiko Takahashi's manga work.
